document_data.name: Beyd Sechepol
document_data.mainbody: '''Beyd Sechepol''' was a merchant during the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: Beyd was a very diplomatic individual, always evading arguments that divided public opinion, with the exception of topics regarding horses and gear.
document_data.History: Beyd boarded a great caravan in order to sell his ale and beer at the start of the Tyranny of Dragons in [[1489 DR]]. Unknown to him, it was full of agents from the [[Cult of the Dragon]] who were transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
